attributes.title: Really slow
attributes.review: It lags a ton and the font is unnecessarily large. Really slow and glitches a lot.

attributes.title: EWWW
attributes.review: This is app is terrible i downloaded it and i just got very annoyed . And it just felt off about everything i didnt like tha fact that the theme was orange & rascist im not here for that vibe 🥰 .

attributes.title: Trash app! 😤💅
attributes.review: This app is garbage! Nobody should be able to support this app or see the horrific things posted in there!! I deleted right away! Very bad app 0/5 stars >:(

attributes.review: I was made a promise that once I downloaded it zac effron would show up at my door and sadly he did not. Hate this app 😤😤😤 once again the orange has lied to me 😩🧚🏼

This app is horrendous it is just horrible my phone started to slow down and it asked me if I was black and I said yes and I kicked me out

attributes.title: Glitchy
attributes.review: So many glitches. Crashed my phone. Loud noise when I touched the screen. Deleting immediately.
